snippet: In rejecting the appeals of Guantánamo detainees that challenge the legality of their imprisonment, the justices are denying the prisoners a basic right.
abstract: Editorial argues that by rejecting the appeals of Guantanamo detainees that challenge the legality of their imprisonment, the Supreme Court has reversed its position on the basic Constitutional right of habeas corpus.
lead_paragraph: In rejecting the appeals of Guantánamo detainees that challenge the legality of their imprisonment, the justices are denying the prisoners a basic right.

headline.seo: The Supreme Court Retreats on Habeas
